sentences.sContent: Despite strong criticism , the new system is still in place.
sentences.sCn: 尽管遭到了猛烈的批评，新制度依然原封不动。

sentences.sContent: There has been widespread criticism of the decision.
sentences.sCn: 这一决定受到了普遍的批评。

sentences.sContent: We try to give students constructive criticism .
sentences.sCn: 我们设法对学生提出有建设性的批评。

sentences.sContent: Another criticism levelled at him was that his teaching methods were old-fashioned.
sentences.sCn: 还有一个针对他的批评是，他的教学方法已经过时。

sentences.sContent: The government’s economic strategy has attracted a lot of criticism .
sentences.sCn: 政府的经济政策招致了大量的批评。

sentences.sContent: You must learn to accept criticism .
Many employees find it hard to take even mild criticism .
sentences.sCn: 有许多员工甚至连轻微的批评也很难接受。

sentences.sContent: His actions provoked severe criticism from civil rights groups.
sentences.sCn: 他的行为招致了民权组织的严厉批评。

sentences.sContent: the storm of criticism that followed his announcement
sentences.sCn: 他的声明引来的批评浪潮
